qt.Title: Reservoir Dogs
qt.Writer: Quentin Tarantino, Roger Avary (background radio dialog), Quentin Tarantino (background radio dialog)
qt.Actors: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen, Chris Penn
qt.Plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

qt.Title: Pulp Fiction
qt.Writer: Quentin Tarantino (story), Roger Avary (story), Quentin Tarantino
qt.Actors: Tim Roth, Amanda Plummer, Laura Lovelace, John Travolta
qt.Plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

qt.Title: Jackie Brown
qt.Writer: Quentin Tarantino (written for the screen by), Elmore Leonard (novel)
qt.Actors: Pam Grier, Samuel L. Jackson, Robert Forster, Bridget Fonda
qt.Plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.
qt.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 21 nominations.

qt.Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
qt.Writer: Quentin Tarantino, Quentin Tarantino (character The Bride), Uma Thurman (character The Bride)
qt.Actors: Uma Thurman, Lucy Liu, Vivica A. Fox, Daryl Hannah
qt.Plot: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.
qt.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 25 wins & 85 nominations.

qt.Title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
qt.Writer: Quentin Tarantino, Quentin Tarantino (character The Bride), Uma Thurman (character The Bride)
qt.Actors: Vivica A. Fox, Ambrosia Kelley, Michael Parks, James Parks
qt.Plot: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.
qt.Awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 21 wins & 72 nominations.

qt.Title: Death Proof
qt.Actors: Kurt Russell, Zoë Bell, Rosario Dawson, Vanessa Ferlito
qt.Plot: Two separate sets of voluptuous women are stalked at different times by a scarred stuntman who uses his "death proof" cars to execute his murderous plans.

qt.Title: Inglourious Basterds
qt.Actors: Brad Pitt, Mélanie Laurent, Christoph Waltz, Eli Roth
qt.Plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

qt.Title: Django Unchained
qt.Actors: Jamie Foxx, Christoph Waltz, Leonardo DiCaprio, Kerry Washington
qt.Plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

qt.Title: The Hateful Eight
qt.Actors: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Walton Goggins
qt.Plot: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

pta.Title: Punch-Drunk Love
pta.Actors: Adam Sandler, Jason Andrews, Don McManus, Emily Watson
pta.Plot: A psychologically troubled novelty supplier is nudged towards a romance with an English woman, all the while being extorted by a phone-sex line run by a crooked mattress salesman, and purchasing stunning amounts of pudding.
pta.Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 34 nominations.

pta.Title: The Master
pta.Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Price Carson, Mike Howard, Sarah Shoshana David
pta.Plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.
pta.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 76 wins & 179 nominations.
